tool_description: The Latest News API enables you to fetch the most recent news articles within the past 24 hours based on a specified search keyword. Utilizing web scraping techniques, it extracts pertinent information from Google News, providing details such as title, author, publication date, and a direct link to the complete article. This API is ideal for integrating real-time and up-to-date news content into your applications, websites, or services.
name: Latest News API
title: Latest News API

api_list.name: Get Latest News
api_list.description: This endpoint will return back the most recent news articles from Google News within the past 24 hours based on a specified search keyword.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://latest-news-api1.p.rapidapi.com/news/Ukraine War"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "latest-news-api1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://latest-news-api1.p.rapidapi.com/news/{searchkeyword}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "latest-news-api1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
